You'll save 10% on each refill order from here on out (that's a total of 35% savings compared to buying full size). Better for your wallet and for the planet.

settings.subtitle: FAQ

settings.title: How do I know what products work for me?
settings.answer: Having trouble finding your perfect trestique makeup routine? Our team of beauty experts are here to help you! Schedule a video chat with our beauty experts and we’ll help you determine which products work best for your lifestyle. You can also take this quiz to help find your perfect routine.

settings.title: Are your makeup products suitable for all skin types?
settings.answer: Yes, our products are formulated to work for all skin types.

settings.title: What is your ingredient philosophy?
settings.answer: We believe in high performance makeup and offering you a unique delivery system that combines the tools you need with the formulas you love. Why? Because you get better color, smoother application and longer lasting results. We infuse our products with natural plant-based ingredients, like coconut oil, when possible, so we know you will love them!

settings.title: Do you test on animals? Are you cruelty-free?
settings.answer: We do not! Our products are cruelty-free + vegan. Yes! And we are PETA-certified (leaping bunny).

settings.title: Are trestique products vegan?
settings.answer: Yes! All of our products are vegan.

settings.title: How are your products refillable?
settings.answer: You can refill your Forever Case (or original navy blue packaging) with formulas and/or tools as needed. This way you save time, money and the planet! Just snap out the old refill cartridges (in cream color packaging), recycle them and then pop in your new cartridge as needed.

settings.title: Are my black magnetic trestique products refillable?
settings.answer: Our refill cartridges will not fit in our original (or past) packaging. Our complete line was redesigned to be more sustainable as well as recyclable, and unfortunately magnetic caps cannot be recycled! All new products are made with either post-consumer or post-industrial recycled materials allowing you to keep the case forever and refill the color cartridges endlessly.

settings.title: What are your products free of?
settings.answer: At trestique, performance and safety are our top priorities. We are committed to health and safety standards that go way beyond the US and surpass the high bar of the EU guidelines—eliminating harmful ingredients including parabens, phthalates, sulfates, PEGs, BHA, Gluten, fragrance, mineral oil, formaldehyde, triclosan/tricarbon, among many other things (and we’re not including things you can paint your house with). PETA-Certified, Cruelty-Free, Vegan.

settings.title: Were any of your old products reformulated?
settings.answer: Yes! We reformulated our Foundation Stick to have more coverage and active, skin-loving ingredients and a carrot complex known to protect against the harmful damages of blue light. Check it out here. We also reformulated our Matte Lip Crayons to be fully vegan. All of our other product formulas have stayed the same!

settings.title: Do you test on animals? Are you cruelty-free?
settings.answer: We don’t test on animals! Our products are cruelty-free + vegan. We are PETA-certified (leaping bunny).

settings.title: How are trestique products sustainable?
settings.answer: We strive to be as sustainable as possible with the products we create. All of our product packaging is made from either post-consumer or post-industrial recycled plastic at different levels. On average, our products use 86% recycled materials in the packaging. Not only that, but every product we offer is refillable and empty refill cartridges can be recycled through PACT. Our products are also carbon neutral - we offset the carbon emissions involved in creating and shipping each product. See our promo page

settings.title: Are all trestique products refillable?
settings.answer: Yes! Every product we offer is refillable, which means you can keep your Forever Case (or original navy blue packaging) and refill your formulas and/or tools as needed. This way you save time, money and the planet! Just snap out the old refill cartridges (in cream color packaging), recycle them and then pop in your new cartridge as needed.

settings.title: How is trestique zero-waste?
settings.answer: Our new line of products is designed to have as minimal of an impact on the environment as possible. Now that all products are refillable, you never have to toss old packaging in the trash. When you run out, just refill—forever and ever. We are committed to reducing consumption, waste and the use of single-use plastics in our industry.

settings.title: What is carbon neutral?
settings.answer: Our products are carbon neutral, which means we have analyzed the amount of carbon emitted during the manufacturing process of each of our products. With this information, we've then partnered with Carbonfund.org to offset those carbon emissions. We also offset the emissions involved in shipping the product to you.

settings.title: What is your packaging made of?
settings.answer: All of our products are made from either post-consumer or post-industrial recycled plastic or aluminum. This means we take plastic either used by consumers or at industrial factories and re-purpose it to create our packaging. The Forever Case is made from 100% post-industrial recycled aluminum (except for the Brow Pencil, which is made from 100% post-consumer recycled plastic for the Forever Case). The refill cartridges are made with different levels, to see the details, click here.

settings.title: What is PACT and how can I recycle my products?
settings.answer: PACT is a collective we have partnered with in order to recycle your old products and refills. Plastic that is smaller than a yogurt cup can't be recycled in a regular recycling facility and has to be sent to a particular place in order to be recycled. If you want to recycle any products or refills, click here.

settings.title: What is auto-refill?
settings.answer: Auto-refill allows you to receive your trestique refills automatically, so you never have to worry about running out of your favorite products. Better for your wallet and for the planet.

settings.title: What are the perks of auto-refill?
settings.answer: Auto-refill earns you free shipping and 10% off on your subscription items (including your first order and all future refills). You'll also save 35% when you purchase a refill cartridge vs. the full size product.

settings.title: How do I subscribe to auto-refill?
settings.answer: Easy! Select the auto-replenishment option on the product page of your choice. Then, schedule how often you'd like to receive your refills. You can choose 4, 6, 8 or 12 week intervals. Learn more here.

settings.title: How can I update my auto-refill subscription?
settings.answer: To make changes to your subscription, create an account here. Once complete, you can manage your subscriptions directly within your trestique account.

settings.title: What payment options are available?
settings.answer:
We currently accept credit, debit and PayPal.

Please note, the following payment methods are not currently available for subscription orders: AfterPay, Klarna and Amazon Pay.

settings.title: Can I update my address and/or payment information?
settings.answer:
Yes, simply log into your trestique account here and manage your subscription.

If you would like to sign up for a trestique account, please do so here.

settings.title: Can I use a promo code and/or store credit on my auto-refill order?
settings.answer: At this time, promo codes and store credit cannot be applied to auto-refill orders.

settings.title: What is trestique's Shipping Policy
settings.answer: Please see our Shipping Policy here.

settings.title: What is trestique's return policy?
settings.answer: Please see our return policy here.

settings.title: Where can I request a return or exchange?
settings.answer:
Please click here to access our return portal.

We will ask for your 5-digit purchase order number and your email. If you are having trouble finding these, please be sure to let us know at hello@trestique.com!

settings.title: I made a mistake, how can I update my order?
settings.answer: Updates are made on a case-by-case basis. Please contact us at hello@trestique.com to discuss any specific updates.

settings.title: Are there any limitations with promo codes?
settings.answer: You may only apply one promo code per order. Depending on the rules of the promo code received, some may only be applied to orders of a certain minimum total.

settings.title: Can I expedite my order?
settings.answer: Yes, if you choose to expedite your order please select your preferred shipment method at checkout. Please note that our fulfillment center is closed on Saturday and Sunday and U.S. national holidays. Any orders placed on Friday or during the weekend will be processed & shipped out the following Monday.

settings.title: Do you offer gift wrap?
settings.answer: To minimize the amount of waste produced, we do not offer gift wrap.

settings.title: How do I track my order?
settings.answer: Once your order has shipped, you will receive a tracking number in your inbox. You can also sign into your trestique account or contact our team at hello@trestique.com.

settings.title: COVID-19 Statement
settings.answer: Our warehouse is following CDC guidelines and practicing protocols such as social distancing, wearing masks, doing daily temperature checks and sanitizing the facility.

settings.title: How can I join your Rewards and Referral Program?
settings.answer: Easy! All you have to do is sign up for a customer account, and you will automatically unlock your exclusive access to our Rewards and Referral Program. Then, the store credit you earn can be used towards future orders. By creating an account with trestique, you will get a more customized experience. Having an account also makes it easy to keep track of past orders, save time on the checkout process and quickly reorder your favorite products. Start earning rewards by clicking here.

settings.title: How does the program work?
settings.answer: Once you log in, you will earn 5% store credit back on your first order and on all orders placed there after. Once your lifetime spend is $250, you’ll earn 10% of your order total back in store credit for all orders placed there after. Once your lifetime spend is $900, you’ll earn 15% of your order total back in store credit back for all orders placed there after.

settings.title: How does refer-a-friend work?
settings.answer: Give your friends 15% off their order, and once their purchase is complete, you'll get $15 store credit in your account. You can refer a friend by accessing our rewards page here.

settings.title: How can I see my store credit and/or gift card balance?
settings.answer: There are a few ways to find out what your store credit balance is, whether you received it through a return, gift card or our Rewards and Referral Program. The first step is to sign into your customer account. You can then view your store credit balance on your "Account Details" page or via our quick apply feature on the checkout page. To find out your e-gift card balance, you can access it here.

settings.title: Does my store credit expire?
settings.answer:
Yes, your store credit expires depending on the tier you have reached.
Tier 1 - expires after 3 months.
Tier 2 - expires after 6 months.
Tier 3 - never expires.

settings.title: How do I know I received store credit after my purchases if I have reached different tiers?
settings.answer: You will receive an email each time you have earned store credit as it is dependent on the tier you have reached in our program as well as your order total. The store credit will be added to your existing balance which can be seen on your "Account Details" page when you log in.

settings.title: Can I combine store credit with e-gift cards?
settings.answer: Yes! Just sign in to your account, click the "Store Credit" button, and a pop-up will open where you can enter your Gift Card Code. This total will be added to your pre-existing store credit.

settings.title: Can rewards get applied retroactively?
settings.answer: No, rewards cannot be applied to past purchases prior to signing up for our Rewards and Referral program.

settings.title: Is it safe to save my payment information to my account?
settings.answer: Yes! All payment information is securely stored through encryption, offering you a huge time saver for your next order. Saving payment information is not required.

settings.title: What forms of payment do you accept?
settings.answer:
We accept all major debit and credit cards: Visa, Mastercard, Discover, and American Express along with payments from international Visa, Mastercard, and American Express credit cards. We also accept forms of electronic payment such as Paypal, Amazon Pay, Google Pay and Apple Pay. All international orders will be charged in U.S. dollars so please be aware that additional foreign transaction fees may be applied by your international bank.

We also offer interest-free payments in installments using Klarna or Afterpay. Just select one of these options at checkout.

settings.title: My payment was declined. What should I do?
settings.answer:
There are a few reasons your payment might not go through. Please double check the following:
1. Does your billing info (such as billing address + zip code, security code, expiration) match what’s been entered on the checkout page?
2. Insufficient funds: Please contact us at hello@trestique.com for additional assistance.

settings.title: When can I expect my refund?
settings.answer: Please allow up to 21 business days for processing your request once we have received your returned package.

settings.title: How do I send a gift card?
settings.answer: We offer e-gift cards for you or a loved one. You can purchase one here. Simply enter the gift amount, recipient’s name, a greeting and desired send date.

settings.title: How do I redeem my gift card?
settings.answer: If you are the recipient of trestique e-gift card, simply enter the gift card code at checkout.

settings.title: Do you ship to my country?
settings.answer: At trestique, we believe sustainable products and clean formulas should be available for all. For a complete list of countries that we ship to, please see the dropdown menu at checkout!

settings.title: Who handles trestique's international shipping?
settings.answer: Passport is our trusted third-party partner and they ensure all international orders are handled with care. They have numerous partners around the world that handle our packages to assure they are delivered safely and efficiently.

settings.title: What payment methods are accepted?
settings.answer: To place an international order, you can process your payment using PayPal or international credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and Discover).

settings.title: How much do I pay for shipping?
settings.answer:
The shipping cost is determined at checkout and is based on the shipping destination.

To create the best delivery experience, Passport ships all international orders Delivered Duty Paid (DDP). This means that duties and taxes are collected right at checkout. The best part? This method prevents your package from getting held up by customs.

**Please be advised that the country and product can influence the cost of duties and taxes.

settings.title: How can I track my order?
settings.answer: trestique provides you a tracking number and link when the order is fulfilled. This is typically within 24 hours after you place your order (excluding weekends and holidays). You can track the status of your order through this tracking number.

settings.title: How long will it take for my order to arrive?
settings.answer: The delivery time varies depending on the route and destination. Typically, it takes between 8-14 business days for international shipments to arrive. Please note, these time ranges may vary due to customs clearance, extreme weather or COVID-19 protocols. Once your order is fulfilled, you can find an estimated delivery date on the tracking link provided by our team.

settings.title: What is your return policy on international orders?
settings.answer: We currently do not accept returns or exchanges on international orders. If a product arrives in poor conditions, please be sure to contact our team at hello@trestique.com and we can assist you immediately.

settings.title: How do I pay duties/taxes?
settings.answer:
Typically, you pay duties and taxes at checkout when you place your order. You will see the total cost upfront before placing the order. This way you won’t have to pay those fees when the parcel is delivered to you.

In a few instances, you may be asked to pay duties and taxes when the order is delivered to you. This may be due to a destination/country requirement or if these fees were not collected at the time of checkout.

settings.title: What if my order becomes stuck in customs?
settings.answer:
We are confident that most shipments make it through customs without any delays. With that being said, customs authorities may review a shipment and may ask for additional information before the customs authorities clear the shipment for final delivery.

If you experience longer than usual delays, please reach out via email at help@passportshipping.com

settings.text: We aim to respond to all emails within 24-48hrs.
We use cookies to give you the best shopping. By using this site, you agree to its use of cookies.

settings.title: Beauty we believe in
settings.text: Our mission is to provide our lovely customers with quality beauty and skincare products that are not only created with top -notch organic ingredients, but make you feel beautiful as well – and give you that GLOW!  We love hearing from our customers, and listening to what is important to them and what they'd like to see. As there is a lot of buzz and movement in the natural-beauty sphere these days, we ensure that we carry the highest quality natural products that contain only the purest, non-toxic ingredients.

settings.title: Our mission is to empower people with time-saving beauty routines and uncomplicated products that respect them and the planet, 100%.
Our story
settings.text:
When our founders Jenn Kapahi and Jack Bensason launched Trestique six years ago, they focused on extraordinary quality, innovative packaging and unfussy routines. Their industry expertise empowered them to create an original cruelty-free makeup line, made in Italy and delivered in 2-in-1 makeup crayons combining high-performance formulas with built-in application tools. Over the years, Jenn and Jack have continued to develop the brand—relentlessly improving the formulas and the packaging, making them both cleaner and more sustainable with every iteration. 

Today, Trestique is on the forefront of the packaging revolution. Jenn and Jack have created 100% reusable and refillable products from post consumer recycled materials. From the formulas to the packaging, everything was developed through a lens of sustainability. “We are in an authentic revolution with a promise of transparency,” adds Jack.

Trestique was always about everything you need and nothing you don’t, you touched-up in 5 minutes, leaving more time for living and doing the things you love. It always developed high-performance and clean formulas and always presented easy-to-apply crayons. “We were on our way to super sustainability when the world told us it was time to dive in,” says Jenn. Now customers can feel good that our brand values align with their own. Now our actions match our conscience, socially and environmentally.

Now we can all celebrate: Trestique is eco-friendly, eco-smart, and eco-conscious.

settings.title: Empowering people
settings.text: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: Respecting people and the planet
settings.text: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: Our commitment to you
settings.subtitle: We will continually ever-evolve our sustainability efforts as technical advancements catch up with our intentions.

settings.title: Giving back
settings.text: We partner with organizations to allow you as the customer to donate to what matters to you.

settings.title: Your safety is our priority
settings.text: Product performance and safety are our top priorities. We’re committed to health and safety standards that go far beyond the US and surpass the high bar of the EU guidelines. We will never formulate with harmful ingredients, including parabens, phthalates, sulfates, PEGs, BHA, Gluten, fragrance, mineral oil, formaldehyde, triclosan/ tricarbon, among many other ingredients that are potentially hazardous. We are PETA-certified, cruelty-free and vegan.

settings.title: We always come clean
settings.text: We believe in ingredient transparency. You will always know what’s in your trestique products. And if you have a question about a product formulation, we’re here to provide the straight answer.

settings.title: We have over 30 years of industry experience
settings.text: Our products are developed by beauty industry experts who have a combined 30+ years of experience. We partner with a renowned lab in Italy to ensure we are formulating the cleanest and most innovative products.

settings.title: Never list
settings.text: All of our product formulas must be in compliance with EU, USA, Canada, Australia, UK. We never include any of the following ingredients that can be linked to cancer, hormone disruptions, are allergens or toxic to the body and/or environment.

- Parabens

- D5 (Cyclopentasiloxane)

- Phthalates

- Petrolatum

- Paraffins

- Mineral oil

- BHA

- Triethanolamine (TEA)

- TEA-Sulfate

- TEA-Lactate/ TEA-Lauryl Sulfate

- Diethanolamine (DEA)

- Cocamide DEA

- Lauramide DEA

- Sodium Laureth/ Lauryl Sulfate if > 0.5%

- Formaldehyde and Formaldehyde Releasing agent

- Methylchloroisothiazolinone

- Methylisothiazolinone

- Benzisothiazolinone

- PEGs – in INCI

- Coal Tar

- Retinyl Palmitate

- Sulfates SLS & SLES

- Oxybenzone

- Styrene

- Bisphenol A (BPA)

- Placenta Extract

- Polysorbates

- Aluminum Compounds (excluding coloring agents)

- BHA (Butylated Hydroxyanisole)

- Chemical Sunscrees

- Hydroquinone

- Animal Fat & Musk

- Aluminum Salts

- Petroleum

- Palm Oil (RSPO only)

- Parfume

- Nano Particles

settings.title: We’re leading the zero waste beauty movement
settings.text: We created the first-ever, zero-waste, refillable cosmetics system. Every product is designed to buy once and refill forever.

settings.title: We use recycled materials whenever possible
settings.text: Our packaging has the highest level of post-consumer and post-industrial recycled materials that technology allows. We’ve reduced the amount of virgin plastic in our packaging by more than 90%. Our full product line is made with an average of 86% recycled materials—the highest in the beauty industry.

settings.title: We’re committed to reducing our carbon impact
settings.text: All of our products are carbon neutral, which means we offset each product’s carbon footprint (including shipping) individually. Our cartons and consumer mailers are printed with soy-based ink on FSC-certified paper. Our office is also 100% remote.
Stats we're proud of

settings.title: How to recycle
settings.text:
How to dispose of your trestique packaging:

— Keep and refill your blue forever shell or shells.

— Recycle shipping boxes and packing paper in your home bin.

— All of our Refills are too small to be recycled at home because they are smaller than a yogurt cup, so drop your empty and cleaned trestique refills into a Pact recycling bin inside any Credo store in the US or Hudson’s Bay store in Canada. Find locations here or use our new Pact mail back recycling program if you don't have access to a Pact bin.

settings.title: How to recycle
settings.text: When your product formula is done, and you're ready to replace with a new one, your old refill cartrigde is 100% recyclable.

settings.title: Internal practices
settings.text: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: Our mission is to empower people with time-saving beauty routines and uncomplicated products that respect them and the planet, 100%.
Our story
settings.text:
When our founders Jenn Kapahi and Jack Bensason launched Trestique six years ago, they were laser focused on extraordinary quality, innovative packaging and uncomplicated routines. Their industry expertise empowered them to create an original, high-performance makeup line delivered in 2-in-1 makeup crayons with built-in application tools. Since then, Jenn and Jack have continued to evolve the brand—relentlessly improving the formulas and the packaging, making them both cleaner and more sustainable with every iteration. 

Simplifying your beauty routine is and always will be a brand priority. But after listening to our customers—who love our packing but loathe throwing it away—developing reusable and refillable packaging became our next priority. “As entrepreneurs, beauty founders, product developers and most importantly human beings, it was time to take a step in the right direction to create something that helps the world be a better place.” explains Jenn.

Today, Trestique is on the forefront of the packaging revolution. Jenn and Jack have created 100% reusable and refillable products from post consumer recycled materials. From our formulas to our packaging, everything is developed through a lens of sustainability. “We are in an authentic revolution with a promise of transparency,” adds Jack. “We feel good that our brand values align with our consumers and that our actions match our conscience, both socially and environmentally.”

settings.title: Empowering you
settings.text: Our mission always has been (and always will be) to empower you with time-saving routines using clean, uncomplicated, multi-tasking products that get you out the door in minutes. Because we want you to spend less time fussing over your makeup and more time doing the things you love.

settings.title: Respecting people and the planet
settings.text: From our formulas to our packaging, everything is developed through a lens of sustainability. We are committed to reducing consumption, waste and the use of single-use plastics—for your health and the health of our planet.

settings.title: Our commitment to you
settings.subtitle: We are the first ever, zero-waste, consciously-formulated, refillable makeup system. We’ve worked hard to close the loop on sustainability for our formulas, packaging, shipping, recycling and carbon footprint. While we are tremendously proud of how far we’ve come, we will continue to find ways to innovate and improve.

settings.title: In The Press
settings.subtitle: CONTACT US DIRECTLY — press@trestique.com

settings.title: WWD: trestique Relaunches With Clean, Zero Waste Refillable Makeup System
settings.text: “It was not only the right thing to do for our customers and our brand, but also for the planet. We really wanted to do better.”

"As a result of supply chain disruptions, beauty brands may have to be a lot more careful about what they launch. Jack Bensason, co-CEO and co-founder of Trestique, doesn’t think that’s necessarily a bad thing. He says, “Maybe less is more, and brands can be more selective in what they bring to market."

"Beauty brand trestique transitioned its entire product line to a refillable system, which founder and co-CEO Jenn Kapahi says will reduce both packaging and product waste because it encourages, or reinforces, the shift in people to only buy what they will actually use."

“trestique The perfect makeup set to get ready for any holiday occasion in just 5 minutes. Made in Italy, these supercool, refillable crayons with clean formulas and sublime textures empower you with time-saving routines using uncomplicated, multi-tasking products that are good for you and the planet.”

“Leading the zero-waste beauty movement is a small but mighty brand that first launched in 2015 but relaunched in September after reducing its plastic use by 90 percent. The first-ever refillable cosmetics system, each product is designed to be bought once and reused forever.”

"As a result of supply chain disruptions, beauty brands may have to be a lot more careful about what they launch. Jack Bensason, co-CEO and co-founder of Trestique, doesn’t think that’s a bad thing. He says, “Maybe less is more, and brands can be more selective in what they bring to market.”
"Makeup brand trestique is relaunching its line with new products, updated formulas and zero-waste packaging that is made from post-consumer and post-industrial recycled materials..."

settings.title: OUR SOLUTION
settings.text: We believe in providing a true solution to the everyday makeup routine. The days of heavy, overflowing makeup bags and time-consuming, complex routines are behind us. trèStiQue offers a simple, organized makeup bag that carries your everyday routine and allows you to make-up anywhere, anytime.

settings.title: A SUPERIOR MAKEUP BAG
settings.text: The sleekest, lightest, most portable makeup bag you've ever seen. Built to keep all your 2-in-1 trèStiQue makeup essentials super organized, neat and mess-free. Fits in the palm of your hand and comes complete with a mirror for easy, on-the-go application. Gone are the days of digging around a messy makeup bag. Our bag allows you to find the products you need quickly and simplify how you carry makeup everyday.

Answer questions about product application, how to refill your product, ingredients + formulas.

Walk you through a 5-minute makeup tutorial.

Offer tips + tricks to ensure you get the most out of your 2-in-1 trestique products.

settings.title: Testimonial
settings.text:
"The video consultation answered all of my questions, even trying on some shades I was iffy about! She was incredibly helpful and we picked out an array of products for me that I think will be definite staples in my makeup bag (which won't be a gigantic box anymore!).

I had tried a few of my friend's trestique products, got hooked and went straight to your website. My first order will be arriving in 2 days - I can't wait! And I've already made a second order. I've been told that your return service is so easy I wasn't even worried. Thank you so much for offering the ability to chat with makeup consultants."

- Catlin Reckord

It's about being comfortable in your own skin and accepting who you are.♥️ "

settings.title: trestique has literally cut my "getting ready" time in half
settings.text:
"I love the whole concept and trestique has become my favorite brand. They are what I call beauty disruptors changing the industry! They have the colors and quality down to a science. trestique has literally cut my "getting ready" time in half. I love the unlimited amount of colors to select from. The packaging is beautiful, sleek, chic, and overall fabulous. Everything stays nice, with no leaks or spills, perfectly intact anywhere anytime. I pretty much never leave home without my go-to travel pack. Beauty makeup game changer- I simply love, love, love trestique!!!!"

- Courtney K.

- Alaina M.

settings.title: Subscribe & save up to 35%
settings.subtitle: You’ve got your refillable case. Now pick a plan and choose your shades. This pro-you, pro-planet system helps cut down on cosmetic waste, while saving you an average 35% compared to buying full packaging. Starting at $20/shipment.

settings.title: Save your wallet, save the world
settings.text:
SAVE ON REFILLS

Not only are you reducing your waste by buying refills but you save an average of 35% by buying less expensive refills than a new, non-refillable product.

CONVENIENT & ECO-SAVVY

By refilling your trestique products you are cutting down your use of virgin plastic by 90% and the amount of cosmetic packaging waste to landfill by a lot.

FREE SHIPPING

Enjoy free shipping on orders $20 +up - only offered with the subscription service.

settings.title: How it works
settings.text:
1. SHOP

Shop our Refills or go to your favorite product page(s).

2. CHOOSE YOUR FREQUENCY

Choose how often you'd like to receive your refills, we recommend every 4, 6, 8 or 12 weeks depending on how often you use your makeup.

3. SAVE MONEY + TIME

Enjoy an additional 10% off refills when you subscribe, free shipping on orders $20 +up and enjoy the fact that you've saved extra cosmetics packaging from landfill.

settings.content_text:
A makeup starter kit you can apply in just 5 minutes or less – anytime, anywhere. Super convenient, super simple and super sustainable. These 2-in-1 refillable products work twice as hard so you don’t have to. Featuring best-selling shades to enhance your natural features – all in a makeup bag the size of a coffee cup.

What's Included
- Choose your own Foundation Stick
- Choose your own Concealer Crayon
- Blush Stick in Moroccan Rose
- Matte Lip Crayon + Balm in Florence Fig
- Shadow Crayon in Morimoto Shimmer
- Eyeliner in Swiss Chocolate
- Choose your own Brow Pencil
- Good Vibes Mascara
- Choose your own Deluxe Le Pak Bag

Why We Love It
After decades of dealing with complicated routines and heavy makeup bags, we created this simple, hardworking, all-in-one kit with everything you need from complexion to eye to lip and only takes 5 minutes to apply.

The Final Look

The ultimate you-but-touched-up trestique look.

settings.title: How it works
settings.text:
CUSTOMIZE YOUR ESSENTIAL 8 OR CREATE YOUR SET:

Build your routine the way you want it! Need help picking your shades? Send us a pic through Selfie Shade Match for your personalized recommendation.

TRY AT HOME FOR 30 DAYS:

Select Klarna at checkout under payments and they will send you further payment instructions via e-mail. Take your products and routine for a test drive in the comfort of your home (without needing to go to a store). Your 30-day trial starts when you place your order.

LOVE IT OR RETURN IT:

Love your new makeup routine? Keep it and pay for the full set on the 30th day of your trial. If it's not for you, reach out to us before your 30 days are up to start your hassle-free return.*

settings.title: Love our routines
settings.text:
You are not 100% sure you are ready to financially commit until you try it? No problem! :)

Simply go to routine of choice, The Essential 8 or The Essential Mix, and begin the journey of building your routine with your shades of choice!

Once you have selected all the items for your customized routine, add the routine to your cart via the Try Before You Buy button. You will see the routine appear in your cart for $0.

The final step to complete your Try Before You Buy order, comes at checkout at the payment options step! Be sure you to select the payment option called Try Before You Buy via Klarna. And you are all set! Your order will be placed and you paid $0! :) If you love it and wish to keep it, Klarna will charge for the full set on the 30th day.

Don’t love it? No worries, just visit our return portal to initiate the return request and we will send you a pre-paid return label to ship back the set to us.

settings.html_content:
FAQ

Frequently asked questions

FAQ

Products & Formulations

Having trouble finding your perfect trestique makeup routine? Our team of beauty experts are here to help you! Schedule a video chat with our beauty experts and we’ll help you determine which routine works best for your lifestyle. You can also take this quiz to help find your perfect routine.

Yes, our products are formulated to work for all skin types.

We believe in high performance makeup and offering you a unique delivery system that combines the tools you need with the formulas you love. Why? Because you get better color, smoother application and longer lasting results. We infuse our products with natural plant-based ingredients, like coconut oil, when possible, so we know you will love them!

We wanted to make selecting shades super easy for you so we offer a selfie shade match option on our website. All you have to do is click here, send us a selfie, and we'll help you choose your perfect shades! We will respond within 48 hours with a product and shade recommendation customized for you.

We do not! Our products are cruelty-free + vegan. Yes! And we are PETA-certified (leaping bunny).

Yes! All of our products are vegan.

Provide the answer to the question here.

At trestique, performance and safety are our top priorities. We are committed to health and safety standards that go way beyond the US and surpass the high bar of the EU guidelines—eliminating harmful ingredients including parabens, phthalates, sulfates, PEGs, BHA, Gluten, fragrance, mineral oil, formaldehyde, triclosan/tricarbon, among many other things (and we’re not including things you can paint your house with). PETA-Certified, Cruelty-Free, Vegan.

Yes! We reformulated our Foundation Stick to have more coverage and active, skin-loving ingredients and a carrot complex known to protect against the harmful damages of blue light. Check it out here. We also reformulated our Matte Lip Crayons to be fully vegan. All of our other product formulas have stayed the same!

Sustainability

We strive to be as sustainable as possible with the products we create. All of our product packaging is made from either post-consumer or post-industrial recycled plastic at different levels. On average, our products use 86% recycled materials in the packaging. Not only that, but every product we offer is refillable and empty refill cartridges can be recycled through PACT. Our products are also carbon neutral - we offset the carbon emissions involved in creating and shipping each product.

Yes! Every product we offer is refillable, which means you can keep your Forever Case (or original navy blue packaging) and refill your formulas and/or tools as needed. This way you save time, money and the planet! Just snap out the old refill cartridges (in cream color packaging), recycle them and then pop in your new cartridge as needed.

Our new line of products is designed to have as minimal of an impact on the environment as possible. Now that all products are refillable, you never have to toss old packaging in the trash. When you run out, just refill—forever and ever. We are committed to reducing consumption, waste and the use of single-use plastics in our industry.

Our products are carbon neutral, which means we have analyzed the amount of carbon emitted during the manufacturing process of each of our products. With this information, we've then partnered with Carbonfund.org to offset those carbon emissions. We also offset the emissions involved in shipping the product to you.

All of our products are made from either post-consumer or post-industrial recycled plastic or aluminum. This means we take plastic either used by consumers or at industrial factories and re-purpose it to create our packaging. The Forever Case is made from 100% post-industrial recycled aluminum (except for the Brow Pencil, which is made from 100% post-consumer recycled plastic for the Forever Case). The refill cartridges are made with different levels, to see the details, click here.

PACT is a collective we have partnered with in order to recycle your old products and refills. Plastic that is smaller than a yogurt cup can't be recycled in a regular recycling facility and has to be sent to a particular place in order to be recycled. If you want to recycle any products or refills, click here.

Orders

Updates are made on a case-by-case basis. Please contact us at hello@trestique.com to discuss any specific updates.

You may only apply one promo code per order. Depending on the rules of the promo code received, some may only be applied to orders of a certain minimum total.

Provide the answer to the question here.

Provide the answer to the question here.

Provide the answer to the question here.

Our warehouse is following CDC guidelines and practicing protocols such as social distancing, wearing masks, doing daily temperature checks and sanitizing the facility.

Payments + Refunds

We accept all major debit and credit cards: Visa, Mastercard, Discover, and American Express along with payments from international Visa, Mastercard, and American Express credit cards. We also accept forms of electronic payment such as Paypal, Amazon Pay, Google Pay and Apple Pay. All international orders will be charged in U.S. dollars so please be aware that additional foreign transaction fees may be applied by your international bank.

We also offer interest-free payments in installments using Klarna or Afterpay. Just select one of these options at checkout.

There are a few reasons your payment might not go through. Please double check the following:
1. Does your billing info (such as billing address + zip code, security code, expiration) match what’s been entered on the checkout page?
2. Insufficient funds: Please contact us at hello@trestique.com for additional assistance.

Provide the answer to the question here.

Provide the answer to the question here.

Shipping + Returns

All products must be returned in unused condition in their original packaging within 30 days of receiving the order. More information here

Click here to access our return portal

See our Shipping Policy here

Couple minutes I’m out the door. It blew me away that you matched me perfect from a photo! Can’t wait to buy more! Thank you!

Comment:I fell in love with trestique a few years ago. I love the whole concept and it has become my favorite brand. I can honestly say I have loved everything I have from them... They have the colors and quality down to a science. The one thing I know is that we all have the same amount of hrs in a day and we can't get back time but trestique has literally cut my "getting ready" time in half... The packaging is beautiful!!! It's sleek, chic, and overall fabulous. Everything stays nice, with no leaks or spills, perfectly intact anywhere anytime. I pretty much never leave home without my go-to travel pack...Beauty makeup game changer - I simply love, love, love trestique!!!!

settings.title: Thank You Healthcare Heroes
settings.subtitle:
We want to say thank you to all of the millions of medical professionals and first responders working tirelessly to fight this pandemic. To show our appreciation, we've increased our discount to all verified healthcare workers to 30% Off through our verification software, ID.me.

Just select this option at checkout.

We appreciate you for all you do on the frontlines and can't thank you enough!

settings.title: "I love this whole line of makeup! It is so easy to apply and stays well. Literally cleared out all of my other makeup and now have everything I need in less space."
settings.text: - L. Morris

settings.title: Zero waste beauty
settings.text:
Endlessly refillable

Every component is designed to buy once and refill forever, endlessly customizable and reusable. Let's put our planet first.

2-in-1

All our products are multi-tasking hard workers with built-in tools specifically designed to work with each formula. Tools can be washed and reused.

Upcycled packaging

Our packaging is next-level sustainable. We construct our packaging using an average of 86% recycled materials. Once you're done, all are 100% recyclable using PACT.

settings.title: Clean formulations
settings.text:
Our never list

We never use harsh chemicals (such as D5 or parabens), synthetic fragrances. Vegan and cruelty-free is the only way to go.

Italian made

All of our formulas are crafted in Italy, at the same facility where you may pay hundreds of dollars with other brands, but we bring you the same quality at half the price.

Women-led

Our founder, Jenn Kapahi, has 17+ years of experience in product development and has centered the voices and opinions of women in crafting our formulas and building our products.

settings.title: Personalized makeup routines
settings.subtitle: All of our products are designed to mix and match creating infinite combinations and timeless looks that will all fit in one bag, yes one!

settings.content: “If you haven't heard of trestique’s line of two-in-one products, now is the time to get them on your radar.”
“Kapahi hopes trestique's innovative product offering will promote other brands to use more sustainably sourced packaging and other refillable and reusable products.”

“trestique transitioned its entire product line to a refillable system,...which will reduce both packaging and product waste because it encourages the shift in people to only buy what they will actually use.”
